title: EP 167: THE MYTH OF FORGIVENESS, PURSUING THE DREAM & TROUBLED FAMILY
description: The lunacy of posting workout videos. The myth of forgiveness and "letting go". I answer emails! Can a listener who never had a great relationship with her mom have a great relationship now? Can a guy who's about to have a baby possibly pursue a stand up career? A girl wonders how long she has to remain empathetic towards her depressed, non-medicated sister. So much to get deep on, bros. Let's get our lives!!
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
